    • Field Detail

      • wordsDone

        protected int wordsDone
        Total words processed by this indexer. Used for reporting progress, do not reset except when finished with file.

      • indexLinkedDocument

        protected void indexLinkedDocument(String inputFile,
                                   String pathInsideArchive,
                                   String documentPath,
                                   String inputFormatIdentifier,
                                   String storeWithName)
                            throws IOException
        Index a linked document.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - where the linked document can be found (file or http(s) reference)
        pathInsideArchive - if input file is an archive: the path to the file we need inside the archive
        documentPath - XPath to the specific linked document we need
        inputFormatIdentifier - input format of the linked document
        storeWithName - if set, store the linked document and store the id to it in a field with this name with "Cid" (content id) appended to it
        Throws:
        IOException - on error

      • indexSpecificDocument

        public abstract void indexSpecificDocument(String documentExpr)
        Index a specific document. Only supported by DocIndexerBase.
        Parameters:
        documentExpr - Expression (e.g. XPath) used to find the document to index in the file

      • resolveFileReference

        protected File resolveFileReference(String inputFile)
                             throws IOException
        Given a URL or file reference, either download to a temp file or find file and return it.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - URL or (relative) file reference
        Returns:
        the file
        Throws:
        IOException

      • dedupe

        protected String dedupe(String possibleDupe)
        If we've already seen this string, return the original copy. This prevents us from storing many copies of the same string.
        Parameters:
        possibleDupe - string we may already have stored
        Returns:
        unique instance of the string

      • storeWholeDocument

        protected void storeWholeDocument(String document)
        Store the entire document at once. Subclasses that simply capture the entire document can use this in their storeDocument implementation.
        Parameters:
        document - document to store

      • storeDocument

        protected abstract void storeDocument()
        Store (or finish storing) the document in the content store. Also set the content id field so we know how to retrieve it later.

      • optTranslateFieldName

        protected String optTranslateFieldName(String from)
        Translate a field name before adding it to the Lucene document. By default, simply returns the input. May be overridden to change the name of a metadata field as it is indexed.
        Parameters:
        from - original metadata field name
        Returns:
        new name

      • beginWord

        protected void endWord()

      • annotation

        protected void annotation(String name,
                          String value,
                          int increment,
                          List<Integer> indexAtPositions)
        Index an annotation. Can be used to add annotation(s) at the current position (indexAtPositions == null), or to add annotations at specific positions (indexAtPositions contains positions). The latter is used for standoff annotations. Also called for subannotations (with the value already prepared)
        Parameters:
        name - annotation name
        value - annotation value
        increment - if indexAtPosition == null: the token increment to use
        indexAtPositions - if null: index at the current position; otherwise: index at these positions

      • subAnnotation

        protected void subAnnotation(String mainName,
                             String subName,
                             String value,
                             List<Integer> indexAtPositions)
        Index a subannotation. Can be used to add subannotation(s) at the current position (indexAtPositions == null), or to add annotations at specific positions (indexAtPositions contains positions). The latter is used for standoff annotations.
        Parameters:
        mainName - annotation name
        subName - subannotation name
        value - annotation value
        indexAtPositions - if null: index at the current position; otherwise: index at these positions

      • getMetadataFetcher

        protected MetadataFetcher getMetadataFetcher()
        Get the external metadata fetcher for this indexer, if any. The metadata fetcher can be configured through the "metadataFetcherClass" parameter.
        Returns:
        the metadata fetcher if any, or null if there is none.
